entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
